hero.description: Discover our curated selection of artisanal decorations and thoughtful gifts, designed to make your holiday season unforgettable.

categories.title: Luxury Essentials
categories.description: Every piece in our collection is hand-selected for its quality, craftsmanship, and ability to transport you to a winter wonderland.

product1.name: Handcrafted Luxury Wreath
product1.desc: Premium balsam fir with gold accents.

product3.name: Midnight Pine Candle
product3.desc: Natural soy wax with pine & cedar.

artisan.title: Crafting Memories, Not Just Decor.
artisan.description: Our master florist and designers work tirelessly to ensure that every wreath, candle, and ornament is a masterpiece of festive beauty. We use sustainable materials and traditional techniques that have been passed down through generations.

newsletter.title: Join the Boutique
newsletter.description: Subscribe to receive exclusive early access to our holiday collections and festive styling tips directly to your inbox.

footer.description: Elegance in every snowflake. We bring the finest European Christmas traditions to your home.
